tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We would like to express our gratitude to the Most Honorable, Respected Dr. Rushda Riaz a one of the best Gynecologist for her endeavor to make us being proud to have a healthy Baby boy. 

This is the second time we have become parents under her guidance & counsel, her proper instruction for treatment for infertility is outstanding and Masterful. She is a well-experienced Doctor with no exception.

She listens to our problems with care and instructs, Examine, and heals with Exact proper medication.  and She is always available over the Phone whenever We need her, She Treats her patient with Humble,

At Last, we found her all the best qualities a Human Should have in the form of a Doctor, she is a friend to the Patient, a Mentor, a Guide, An Elder Like in a Family, Best Instructor and Most Important She answers all our Calls and Instructs with Proper guidance, We are content with her counsel & Advice.

For us, she is Everything and She will be Progressive in her career and Happy in her Life that's our Prayer and Well Wish for her Life. 

 "This is our True & genuine feeling for her", not just a Comments or Feedback 

We wish her the Best of Luck in her Career and Life.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Through our family doctor Dr. Aditya Jayaraman, we found the way to an ANGEL i.e. Dr. Rushda Riaz. The journey of our baby was started from very much difficulty. Initially, we went to a Gynae and as per her advice ‚Äì we got done the ultrasound but she told this baby cannot be carried further and D&C is required. Then I discussed the matter with Dr. Aditya Jayaraman and he told to get in touch with Dr. Riaz (Gynae). She told us to get done one more ultrasound after 1 week, we got done and sent the report to Dr. Riaz ‚Äì that was the miracle, heartbeat of baby was observed and she called me herself to start the medication to avoid any miscarriage.
Since then we followed all advices given by Dr. Riaz. There were some difficulties but Dr. Riaz managed so well and guided us accordingly.
Finally, we have got a baby boy (in normal delivery done by Dr. Riaz). Dr. Rushda Riaz has become our ‚ÄúANGEL‚Äù now.
GOD BLESS YOU (Dr. Rushda Riaz). Thanks a lot MAM.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: 'To be a good doctor, you first have to be a good human being'. That's very true for Dr. Rushda Riyaz. During 6th months of my wife's pregnancy, suddenly there were some complications and unfortunately Dr. Rushda was out of country, I sent her what's app message and she guided on what's app and taken follow up till the condition was normal. Whenever there was any issue, be it any time of night or day, she was always available over call. On 7th April' 20, we became a happy parent and it was a normal delivery and the whole credit goes to Dr. Rushda Riyaz.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have been in consultation Dr. Rusda after 3-4 month of my pregnancy before this I consulted with 3-4 gynecologist. But I find Dr. Rusda is excellent in her behaviour as well as excellent in tackling the issue. She also responded us at midnight when I am suffering from labor pain. I never seen such dedication towards his work and caring towards her patient. I heartily thanks her for making my pregnancy journey very smooth. I blessed with a baby girl. Thanks once again.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Over all treatment during pregnancy was satisfied with Dr Rushda Riyaz like a family member. And the important thing is that her experienced and knowledge. And till the baby birth we were confidant because of you were with us.
We are very happy to choose you, thanks for everything. 

Mother of baby
Ishrat Bano

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Guys ! I am really very happy sharing my experience with you. We visited Dr. Rushda Riaz from the first day of conception and visited her constantly till delivery for 9 months.  Last week I got my baby also delivered by her without any complications. Our experience with her was just awesome. She is always there for you, no matter what* *** **** * ***** ****** *** she is a really gem of a person. We need more doctors like her.

Dr. Rushda is an amazing gynaecologist. She is very freindly with her patients and is available all the time for them, anytime you call or msg her you will get a quick response. She is very polite and will help with all your queries calmly. I had a wonderfuI Experience with her. I strongly recommend her. **** ******
reply_text: Thanks Barudha for your kind feedbacküòä
